titleStmt.title: The complete captain, or, an abbridgement of Cesars warres with observations upon them; together with a collection of the order of the militia of the ancients; and a particular treatise of modern war: written by the late great generall the Duke of Rohan: Englished by I.C.
Parfait capitaine. English
titleStmt.author: Rohan, Henri, duc de, 1579-1638.
Cruso, John, d. 1681.
Caesar, Julius.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Roger Daniel, printer to the Universitie: and are to be sold [by him] at the Angel in Popes-head alley in London,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Le parfait capitaine.
Title page in red and black.
"A treatise of modern vvar" has separate dated title page; pagination and register are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
